tool_description: Optimizes delivery routes to minimize delays and costs while considering traffic, weather, and delivery constraints.

origin_address.description: Starting point address for the delivery route

delivery_windows.description: Time windows for each destination in format 'HH:MM-HH:MM'

vehicle_type.description: Type of delivery vehicle (bike, van, truck, standard)

priority_addresses.description: Addresses that should be prioritized in the route

error_messages: Invalid address format: Ensure all addresses are complete and properly formatted.
Too many destinations: Maximum 100 destinations allowed per optimization.
Delivery window mismatch: Number of delivery windows must match number of destinations or be empty.
Invalid time window format: Use 'HH:MM-HH:MM' format for delivery windows.
Unreachable destination: One or more destinations cannot be reached from the origin.
Invalid vehicle type: Use one of (bike, van, truck, standard).
usage: Provide origin_address and destination_addresses. Optionally specify delivery_windows, vehicle_type, and other constraints. The tool returns an optimized route with timing and cost estimates.

optimized_route.description: Ordered list of addresses in optimal delivery sequence

estimated_duration.description: Estimated total delivery time in minutes

delivery_eta.description: Estimated arrival times for each destination
